snippet: The Metropolitan Taxicab Board of Trade objects to the plan for “apple green” cabs.
lead_paragraph: To the Editor: '' 'Apple Green' a Hard Sell to Livery Drivers'' (news article, May 1) shows that livery and black-car drivers who illegally pick up street hails gravitate to lucrative Manhattan, where the New York Police Department does not enforce the law and the small force of Taxi and Limousine Commission agents is no match for the incredible volume of activity.
